Address.label: Address
Address.value: 89 A STREET, NEEDHAM, Massachusetts, 02494, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: SharkNinja, Inc. designs, markets, and distributes small household appliances under the Shark and Ninja brand names in the in the United States, China, and internationally. It offers cleaning appliances, such as corded and cordless vacuums; and handheld and robotic vacuums, as well as other floorcare products, including steam mops and wet/dry cleaning floor products. The company provides cooking and beverage appliances, such as air fryers, multi-cookers, outdoor and countertop grills and ovens, coffee systems, kettles, and toasters, as well as cookware, cutlery, and bakeware products; food preparation appliances, including blenders, food processors, ice cream makers, and juicers; and beauty appliances, such as hair dryers and stylers, as well as home environment products, such as air purifiers and garment care products. It sells its products through distributors, retailers, brick-and-mortar, online, and DTC sales.
